attributes.action: Put our British Forces on the streets of Britain to protect the British public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to see our British Forces on the streets of Britain and on border control; we want them to search every car, lorry, plane etc that enters this country especially from France. We want security of Britain to be handed over to the military and let them do what is necessary to make Britain a safer place. Bring our forces home, let them protect us.
